name: City of Cíbola
description:
City of Cíbola is meant to encourage you to try your hand at managing your wealth.  Welcome beyond the falls, and enjoy the City of Cíbola.

How to Play: 

You start out with 80 cíbolan coins [top right corner], and can spend them in the stock market and card store. Return to the main screen to play your cards at the altar, and periodically check on your stocks [bottom] to buy or sell them. Make sure you keep an eye on the timer [top left corner]! You want to earn as much money as you can before the time runs out. Your high scores will display on the main screen. Click buttons with your mouse (most buttons are self explanatory), press P or ESC to pause, and most importantly, I hope you enjoy the game!
